name: CategoryTheory.PreGaloisCategory.functorToAction_comp_forget₂_eq
initialProofState:
C : Type u
inst✝ : CategoryTheory.Category.{v, u} C
F : CategoryTheory.Functor C FintypeCat
⊢ Eq ((CategoryTheory.PreGaloisCategory.functorToAction F).comp (CategoryTheory.forget₂ (Action FintypeCat (MonCat.of (CategoryTheory.Aut F))) FintypeCat)) F
decl: lemma functorToAction_comp_forget₂_eq : functorToAction F ⋙ forget₂ _ FintypeCat = F := rfl

name: CategoryTheory.PreGaloisCategory.functorToAction_map
initialProofState:
C : Type u
inst✝ : CategoryTheory.Category.{v, u} C
F : CategoryTheory.Functor C FintypeCat
X Y : C
f : Quiver.Hom X Y
⊢ Eq ((CategoryTheory.PreGaloisCategory.functorToAction F).map f).hom (F.map f)
decl:
@[simp]
lemma functorToAction_map {X Y : C} (f : X ⟶ Y) : ((functorToAction F).map f).hom = F.map f :=
  rfl

name: CategoryTheory.PreGaloisCategory.instIsPretransitiveAutαFintypeVFintypeCatObjActionOfFunctorFunctorToActionOfIsGalois
initialProofState:
C : Type u
inst✝³ : CategoryTheory.Category.{v, u} C
F : CategoryTheory.Functor C FintypeCat
inst✝² : CategoryTheory.GaloisCategory C
inst✝¹ : CategoryTheory.PreGaloisCategory.FiberFunctor F
X : C
inst✝ : CategoryTheory.PreGaloisCategory.IsGalois X
⊢ MulAction.IsPretransitive (CategoryTheory.Aut X) ↑((CategoryTheory.PreGaloisCategory.functorToAction F).obj X).V
decl:
instance (X : C) [IsGalois X] : MulAction.IsPretransitive (Aut X) ((functorToAction F).obj X).V :=
  isPretransitive_of_isGalois F X

name: CategoryTheory.PreGaloisCategory.instFaithfulActionFintypeCatOfAutFunctorFunctorToAction
initialProofState:
C : Type u
inst✝² : CategoryTheory.Category.{v, u} C
F : CategoryTheory.Functor C FintypeCat
inst✝¹ : CategoryTheory.GaloisCategory C
inst✝ : CategoryTheory.PreGaloisCategory.FiberFunctor F
⊢ (CategoryTheory.PreGaloisCategory.functorToAction F).Faithful
decl:
instance : Functor.Faithful (functorToAction F) :=
  have : Functor.Faithful (functorToAction F ⋙ forget₂ _ FintypeCat) :=
    inferInstanceAs <| Functor.Faithful F
  Functor.Faithful.of_comp (functorToAction F) (forget₂ _ FintypeCat)

name: CategoryTheory.PreGaloisCategory.instPreservesMonomorphismsActionFintypeCatOfAutFunctorFunctorToAction
initialProofState:
C : Type u
inst✝² : CategoryTheory.Category.{v, u} C
F : CategoryTheory.Functor C FintypeCat
inst✝¹ : CategoryTheory.GaloisCategory C
inst✝ : CategoryTheory.PreGaloisCategory.FiberFunctor F
⊢ (CategoryTheory.PreGaloisCategory.functorToAction F).PreservesMonomorphisms
decl:
instance : PreservesMonomorphisms (functorToAction F) :=
  have : PreservesMonomorphisms (functorToAction F ⋙ forget₂ _ FintypeCat) :=
    inferInstanceAs <| PreservesMonomorphisms F
  preservesMonomorphisms_of_preserves_of_reflects (functorToAction F) (forget₂ _ FintypeCat)

name: CategoryTheory.PreGaloisCategory.instReflectsMonomorphismsActionFintypeCatOfAutFunctorFunctorToAction
initialProofState:

⊢ (CategoryTheory.PreGaloisCategory.functorToAction F).ReflectsMonomorphisms

name: CategoryTheory.PreGaloisCategory.instReflectsIsomorphismsActionFintypeCatOfAutFunctorFunctorToAction
initialProofState:
C : Type u
inst✝² : CategoryTheory.Category.{v, u} C
F : CategoryTheory.Functor C FintypeCat
inst✝¹ : CategoryTheory.GaloisCategory C
inst✝ : CategoryTheory.PreGaloisCategory.FiberFunctor F
⊢ (CategoryTheory.PreGaloisCategory.functorToAction F).ReflectsIsomorphisms
decl:
instance : Functor.ReflectsIsomorphisms (functorToAction F) where
  reflects f _ :=
    have : IsIso (F.map f) := (forget₂ _ FintypeCat).map_isIso ((functorToAction F).map f)
    isIso_of_reflects_iso f F

name: CategoryTheory.PreGaloisCategory.instPreservesFiniteCoproductsActionFintypeCatOfAutFunctorFunctorToAction
initialProofState:
C : Type u
inst✝² : CategoryTheory.Category.{v, u} C
F : CategoryTheory.Functor C FintypeCat
inst✝¹ : CategoryTheory.GaloisCategory C
inst✝ : CategoryTheory.PreGaloisCategory.FiberFunctor F
⊢ CategoryTheory.Limits.PreservesFiniteCoproducts (CategoryTheory.PreGaloisCategory.functorToAction F)
decl:
noncomputable instance : PreservesFiniteCoproducts (functorToAction F) :=
  ⟨fun J _ ↦ Action.preservesColimitsOfShape_of_preserves (functorToAction F)
    (inferInstanceAs <| PreservesColimitsOfShape (Discrete J) F)⟩

name: CategoryTheory.PreGaloisCategory.instPreservesFiniteProductsActionFintypeCatOfAutFunctorFunctorToAction
initialProofState:

⊢ CategoryTheory.Limits.PreservesFiniteProducts (CategoryTheory.PreGaloisCategory.functorToAction F)
decl:
noncomputable instance : PreservesFiniteProducts (functorToAction F) :=
  ⟨fun J _ ↦ Action.preservesLimitsOfShape_of_preserves (functorToAction F)
    (inferInstanceAs <| PreservesLimitsOfShape (Discrete J) F)⟩

name: CategoryTheory.PreGaloisCategory.instPreservesColimitsOfShapeActionFintypeCatOfAutFunctorSingleObjFunctorToActionOfFinite
initialProofState:
C : Type u
inst✝⁴ : CategoryTheory.Category.{v, u} C
F : CategoryTheory.Functor C FintypeCat
inst✝³ : CategoryTheory.GaloisCategory C
inst✝² : CategoryTheory.PreGaloisCategory.FiberFunctor F
G : Type u_1
inst✝¹ : Group G
inst✝ : Finite G
⊢ CategoryTheory.Limits.PreservesColimitsOfShape (CategoryTheory.SingleObj G) (CategoryTheory.PreGaloisCategory.functorToAction F)
decl:
noncomputable instance (G : Type*) [Group G] [Finite G] :
    PreservesColimitsOfShape (SingleObj G) (functorToAction F) :=
  Action.preservesColimitsOfShape_of_preserves _ <|
    inferInstanceAs <| PreservesColimitsOfShape (SingleObj G) F
